sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BS1C001T_HPM_V01 WHERE EXEC_ID = 'BX2DF01T_HPM_V01' AND EXEC_STATUS = 'OK'

SELECT FISCAL_YYYYMMDD , FISCAL_YYYYMM , HPMS_ID , JOURNAL_NAME , COMPANY_CD , ORG_CD , ACCOUNT_CD , SUB_ACCOUNT_CD , PARTNER_CD , PID , DUMMY_CD , COMPANY_NM , ORG_NM , ACCOUNT_NM , SUB_ACCOUNT_NM , PARTNER_NM , PID_NM , DUMMY_NM , ITEM_NAME , CUSTOMER_CD , CUSTOMER_NM , TRANSACTION_QTY , TRANSACTION_CURRENCY_TYPE_CD , TRANSACTION_DEBIT , TRANSACTION_CREDIT , LOCAL_CURRENCY_TYPE_CD , LOCAL_REAL_RATE , LOCAL_DEBIT , LOCAL_CREDIT , PLAN_RATE , PLAN_DEBIT_YEN , PLAN_CREDIT_YNE , REAL_RATE , REAL_DEBIT_YEN , REAL_CREDIT_YEN , TRANSACTION_LINE_PRICE , LOCAL_LINE_PRICE , PLAN_LINE_PRICE , REAL_LINE_PRICE , TRANSACTION_LINE_AMT , LOCAL_LINE_AMT , PLAN_LINE_AMT , REAL_LINE_AMT FROM BX2DF01T_HPM_V01 WHERE FISCAL_YYYYMMDD > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -2),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BS1C001T_HPM_V01 WHERE EXEC_ID = 'BX2DF31T_HPM_V01' AND EXEC_STATUS = 'OK'

SELECT FISCAL_YYYYMM , FISCAL_YEAR , HPMS_ID , INVEST_TYPE_CD , ASSET_NUMBER , DESCRIPTION1 , TAG_NUMBER , ASST_CAT_COMPANY , ASST_CAT_COMPANY_DESC , ASST_CAT_USER_TYPE , ASST_CAT_USER_TYPE_DESC , ASST_CAT_ASSET_TYPES , ASST_CAT_ASSET_TYPES_DESC , ASST_CAT_DEP_ASST_TYPES , ASST_CAT_DEP_ASST_TYPES_DESC , DATE_OF_ACQUISITION , PROPERTY_TYPE , CURRENCY_TYPE_CD , CURRENT_COST , CURRENCY_TYPE_CD_LOCAL , CURRENT_COST_LOCAL , CURRENT_COST_PLAN , CURRENT_COST_REAL , EXP_ACCT_COMPANY , EXP_ACCT_ORG , EXP_ACCT_ACCT , EXP_ACCT_SUB_ACCT , EXP_ACCT_PARTNER , EXP_ACCT_PROJECT_ID , EXP_ACCT_COMPANY_DESC , EXP_ACCT_ORG_DESC , EXP_ACCT_ACCT_DESC , EXP_ACCT_SUB_ACCT_DESC , EXP_ACCT_PARTNER_DESC , EXP_ACCT_PROJECT_ID_DESC FROM BX2DF31T_HPM_V01 WHERE ( 1 = 1 )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BS1C001T_HPM_V01 WHERE EXEC_ID = 'BX2DF51T_HPM_V01' AND EXEC_STATUS = 'OK'

SELECT YYYYMMDD , EPD_CODE , HPMS_ID , PID , PID_THEME , COST_TYPE , CAD_DAEMON , CAD_FEATURE , CAD_VENDOR , CAD_PRODUCT , ACCOUNT_NM , COMPANY_CD , ORG_CD , ORG_NM , USER_NM , RUN_TIME , DISK_PATH , DISK_QUOTA , COST FROM BX2DF51T_HPM_V01 WHERE YYYYMMDD > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -2),'YYYYMMDD')
